description:
In _Flash Professional CS5: Code Snippets and Templates in Depth_, David
Gassner shows designers how to use Flash Professional CS5's Code Snippets
panel and file templates to get started with ActionScript 3 and implement best
practices. This course describes how to insert snippets into existing Flash
presentations, includes a detailed explanation of the code behind the
snippets, and shows how to use the many templates included with Flash Pro CS5
to quickly create customized presentations. Exercise files are included with
the course.
title: Flash Professional CS5: Code Snippets and Templates in Depth
